short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RateMyNCC pulls faculty ratings from RateMyProfessors.com and adds them directly onto a course's Section Information page on Merlin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RateMyNCC does not access or store any personal information and is only active when viewing a course's Section Information page on Merlin.
